baseUrl.label: Vault URL
baseUrl.help: Base URL of the Straja Vault HTTP daemon

injectMemoryInPrompt.label: Inject Memory in Prompt
injectMemoryInPrompt.help: Inject MEMORY.md content into every LLM prompt. Useful for smaller models that don't proactively call vault_memory_search. Default: off.

debugLogPrompt.label: Debug: Log LLM Prompt
debugLogPrompt.help: Save the full LLM prompt (system + history + user message) to vault on each turn. View at /raw/_workspace/_debug/last-prompt.json
